SOURCE_FILE="/opt/homebrew/etc/bash_completion.d/git-completion.bash" DEST_DIR="/Users/davidgroomes/.local/share/bash-completion/completions" DEST_FILE="${DEST_DIR}/git"
if [[ ! -f ${SOURCE_FILE} ]]; then echo "The git completion file does not exist: ${SOURCE_FILE}" >&2 exit 1 fi
if [[ ! -d ${DEST_DIR} ]]; then echo "The local completions directory does not exist: ${DEST_DIR}" >&2 exit 1 fi
ln -sf "${SOURCE_FILE}" "${DEST_FILE}"
